inclusion.criterion: Breast Conservative Surgery (Open Cavity/Closed Cavity) or Oncoplasty
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 1.All patients undergoing Breast Conservative Surgery (Open Cavity/Closed Cavity) or Oncoplasty will be eligible for this study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Informed consent will be taken for all patients at the time of Radiotherapy simulation.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer and undergoing radiotherapy. She has no palpable masses on breast exam.
